div.div:
SDKVM Window Manager
Manages interfaces, key binding for the OpenBox window Manager, cursor beaconing and size configuration

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1008px; height: 1px; padding-top: 190px; margin-left: 11px;

div.div:
SDKVM Workspace Server
A REST Based webserver that provides the interface between the OSD, REST API, MQTT Interface and the Client Applications.

SDKVM Core Utilities
